name: Buttercup#2
description:
Imagine if the most exciting part of your day is while stuck inside of a wheel. That's how Buttercup#2 feels. Imagine that you have psychic time-traveling abilities that only come out when you are spinning in this wheel. You will have to imagine that part cause I didn't quite get to it. While spinning the wheel, your psychic self travels to find human bodies to control. Can you control them for your benefit? Who knows? I don't. 

The time-traveling body take over part will have to come later! 

Use your arrow keys to move  or just click. 

Made for Ludum Dare 47
